parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to initiate the next request if the response of the current request is truncated. You can use the token to initiate another request and obtain the remaining records.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. If a response is truncated because it reaches the value of PageSize, the value of IsTruncated will be true. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of resource N.

Valid values of N: 1 to 50. If ResourceType is set to user, the resource ID is the ID of the RAM user.

> You must specify only one of the following parameters: ResourceId and ResourcePrincipalName.

parameters.name: ResourcePrincipalName
parameters.description:
The name of resource N.

Valid values of N: 1 to 50. If ResourceType is set to user, the resource name is the name of the RAM user.

> You must specify only one of the following parameters: ResourceId and ResourcePrincipalName.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid value:

*   user: a RAM user

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tag value.

Valid values of N: 1 to 20. N must be consecutive.
